Feature Generation¶

Feature generation classes:

MagpieFeatureGeneration: Class to generate new features using Magpie data and dataframe containing material compositions

MaterialsProjectFeatureGeneration: Class to generate new features using Materials Project data and dataframe containing material compositions

CitrineFeatureGeneration: Class to generate new features using Citrine data and dataframe containing material compositions

Code¶

class FeatureGeneration.MaterialsProjectFeatureGeneration(configdict, dataframe, mapi_key)[source]¶

Class to generate new features using Materials Project data and dataframe containing material compositions

Parameters:
  • configdict (dict) – MASTML configfile object as dict
  • dataframe (pandas dataframe) – dataframe containing x and y data and feature names
  • mapi_key (str) – your Materials Project API key
generate_materialsproject_features()¶

generates materials project feature set based on compositions in dataframe

Parameters:save_to_csv (bool) – whether to save the magpie feature set to a csv file
Returns:dataframe containing magpie feature set
Return type:pandas dataframe
class FeatureGeneration.CitrineFeatureGeneration(configdict, dataframe, api_key)[source]¶

Class to generate new features using Citrine data and dataframe containing material compositions

Parameters:
  • configdict (dict) – MASTML configfile object as dict
  • dataframe (pandas dataframe) – dataframe containing x and y data and feature names
  • api_key (str) – your Citrination API key
generate_citrine_features()¶

generates Citrine feature set based on compositions in dataframe

Parameters:save_to_csv (bool) – whether to save the magpie feature set to a csv file
Returns:dataframe containing magpie feature set
Return type:pandas dataframe
